title: Hybrid Instruction-Based Education Program for Strengthening Mental Health Nursing Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mental health nursing knowledge and clinical healthcare experience
context.additional_context: Practical online training requirements for learners in managerial/leadership roles within organizations

learning_goals: Learners can apply therapeutic communication techniques with employees experiencing mental health issues with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze real-world cases and develop intervention strategies through Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners evaluate their response capabilities in mental health crisis situations through standardized patient simulations.
Learners can explain mental health disorders and empathetic approaches using film media.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
